snippet.title: Like a Dragon: Ishin! | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Draw your blade and join the revolution! Like a Dragon: Ishin! is out now on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows, and Steam.

Purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition to receive 6 DLC packs including:

- The Dragon of Dojima Skin
- Shinsengumi Captain’s Set
- Ryoma Growth Support Kit
- Sword Upgrade Materials Kit
- Gun Upgrade Materials Kit
- Third Division Armament Expansion Kit

ishin.sega.com

#LikeaDragonIshin #RGGStudio
